    • Method Detail

      • getPlaceForMe

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/findPlaces/{location}/{radius}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ResponseModal>> getPlaceForMe(@PathVariable
	java.lang.String location,
	@PathVariable
	java.lang.String radius,
	@RequestParam(value="type")
	java.lang.String type,
	@RequestParam(value="keyword")
	java.lang.String keyword)

        This method exposes a REST(REpresentational State Transfer) service with URL /service/findPlaces

        It required following parameters

        • 1) location (Required Parameter - This parameter is passed as Path Variable)
        • 2) radius (Required Parameter - This parameter is passed as Path Variable)
        • 3) type (Optional Parameter - This parameter is passed as one of the attribute of the POST Data)
        • 4) keyword (Optional Parameter - This parameter is passed as one of the attribute of the POST Data)

        This method access 2 google API's

        • Find the NearBy Places - for more information please refer : https://developers.google.com/places/web-service/search
        • Find the Elevation - for more information please refer : https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/elevation/start

        Errors are logged into the ${java.io.tmpdir}/application.log location

        Parameters:
        location - First Mandatory Parameter as a Path Variable which is used for specifying the location for Google Places Search API
        radius - Second Mandatory Parameter as a Path Variable which is used for specifying the Range/Radius for Google Places Search API
        type - Third Optional Parameter as a POST Data Load which is used for specifying the location for Google Places Search API
        keyword - Fourth Optional Parameter as a POST Data Load which is used for specifying the location for Google Places Search API
        Returns:
        Spring ResponseEntity which consists ArrayList of ResponseModal Object
